sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the "Illinois
The General Assembly finds that smoking on elevators is a
sections.text:
fire hazard and a danger to public safety and that tobacco smoke is annoying,
harmful and dangerous to human beings and a hazard to public health.

sections.heading: No person shall smoke or possess a lighted
sections.text:
cigarette, cigar, pipe or any other form of tobacco or similar substance
used for smoking on any elevator in this State.

sections.heading: Any person who violates the provisions of this Act is guilty
sections.text:
of a petty offense punishable by a fine of not less than $25 nor more than
$250.
